participant_1.background:
I try to keep up with my family by texting them frequently and calling them on the phone.
i drive a big truck.
i am 10 years old.
I love spending time with friends who have kids of their own, because we can relate to each other and enjoy the same activities.
pizza is my favorite.

participant_2.background:
I have three very close roommates, but I don't see my family often.
I juggle for a living in a circus, and I come from a small town in the Midwest.
I am not close with my family, but I love my dog Bob.
I'm always up for going to a movie with my new love.
I prefer not to have pets since my home is my sanctuary and I need it to be a quiet place.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
Doing well, thanks for asking! How are you?
I'm doing great! I'm just chilling at home. What are you up to?
I'm at work right now, juggling for a living in a circus! It's a lot of fun, but I'm looking forward to going home later.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to be a juggler.
It's a lot harder than it looks! But it's really rewarding when you get it down.
I'm sure it is! Do you have any pets?
I have a dog named Bob. He's a great companion and I love him very much.
That's awesome! I love dogs. I have a big truck and I love driving it around.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm not much of a driver, but I enjoy taking the train.
I like taking the train too, but it's not as much fun as driving a big truck.
I can imagine! Well, I'm glad you're enjoying your day. I'm going to get back to work now.
